original_title: Police seize Rs.92mn worth of ill-gotten assets belonging to 3 drug dealers
original_body_lines: Coinciding with the island-wide special drug operation ‘Yukthiya’, Sri Lanka Police have seized ill-gotten assets worth Rs. 92 million belonging to notorious criminal figures and narcotic dealers “Kudu Asanka”, “Ladiya” and “Kudu Sriyani”.

Accordingly, 3 buses, 2 cars, 2 motorcycles, a three-storey house, 4 plots of land, 50 pounds of gold and Rs. 123,000 in cash have been impounded by the Illegal Assets and Properties Investigation Division of the police.
